  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1663</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Purim</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">teach about Purim: the story of Ester, the costumes,commandments and the customs in a way that they will remember it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">purim</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichten Sie über Purim: die Geschichte
des Esters, der Kostüme, der Gebote und der Gewohnheiten in einer 
Methode, daß sie an sie sich erinnern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignez au sujet de Purim : l'histoire de 
l'ester, des costumes, des commandements et des coutumes d'une voie 
qu'ils se rappelleront la.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensine sobre Purim: a história do ester, 
dos trajes, de commandments e dos costumes em uma maneira que a 
recordarão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegni circa Purim: la storia di estere, 
dei costumi, dei ordini e delle abitudini in un modo che se lo 
ricorderanno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδάξτε για Purim: η ιστορία του εστέρα, των 
κοστουμιών, των εντολών και του τελωνείου με έναν τρόπο ότι θα 
την θυμηθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enseñe sobre Purim: la historia del éster,
de los trajes, de los mandamientos y de los costumbres de una manera 
que la recordarán.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">purim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
